alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 7:39PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong area of showers will impact portions of southeastern Sussex County through 815 PM EDT... At 738 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong showers over the Selbyville area, or 12 miles northwest of Ocean City, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Millsboro, Lewes, Selbyville, Dagsboro, Millville, Henlopen Acres, Gumboro, Cape Henlopen State Park, Long Neck, Ocean View, Frankford, South Bethany and Dewey Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
